Parallel Coordinates to select Time-Series

09 Oct 2016

Parallel coordinates as a way to select a subset of the data to show a Time-Series for instance.

Usage

Same old, but now if you click in a line, the time-serie is displayed on the graph below.

Example

Demonstration

The data is collected through the Pyiso API, the data can also be fetched on the CAISO website
